name: submit_rating
attributes: # [doc = " レンタル終了後にユーザーが評価を投稿するが、"]
# [doc = " rating_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . rating_account ;
acct . count = acct . count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
acct . total_score = acct . total_score . checked_add (rating as u64) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: rating_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] で rating_account.owner と user.key() の一致を検証すべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 評価を投稿するユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この評価を行うべきユーザーの Pubkey"]
